amendment.description: To increase Mandatory Child Care Spending by $4.6 billion over five years and $9.1 billion over ten years by reducing the tax cut.

vote.text: Amendment SA 417 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 90.

action.text: Amendment SA 417 proposed by Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S4351-4352; text: CR S4351) To increase Mandatory Child Care Spending by $4.6 billion over five years and $9.1 billion over ten years by reducing the tax cut.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 417 proposed by Senator Bingaman.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 417 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 90.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 417 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 90.
